Articles.Content:
I can't play ksp anymore.. Because it keeps crashing when i enter vab and place a part

 

Reproduce: Enter VAB, place a part, then ksp stops working

I can't paste the log in because chrome froze when i did it, and i had to write this again. Chrome keeps crashing when i paste..

I use 64bit with about 60 mods, and ksp is not using all my ram.

I want to play ksp.. Im getting frustrated of this crashing

The same thing happened to me... until it didn't. I also can't post logs because it will crash chrome. Patience was the only solution for me, and Now I have a new problem.

Ok, Steam shortcuts can onlylaunch the 32bit version, launching 64bit (typically) works fine.

Edited May 6, 2016 by Andem

22 hours ago, Choice // SLOTH Airlines said:

I can't play ksp anymore.. Because it keeps crashing when i enter vab and place a part

 

Reproduce: Enter VAB, place a part, then ksp stops working

I can't paste the log in because chrome froze when i did it, and i had to write this again. Chrome keeps crashing when i paste..

I use 64bit with about 60 mods, and ksp is not using all my ram.

I want to play ksp.. Im getting frustrated of this crashing

 

 

Join the club... worse, I don't even get a crash log, it just straight crashes to desktop. I don't think I've had a Unity "Oops, the game crashed" type CTD since 1.1.0

The game will run flawlessly stock, but if I wanted to play stock I wouldn't need 64 bit 1.1 now would I? I may have to uninstall KSP, and come back after the next update, hopefully with fewer bugs and more stability.

 

Edited May 6, 2016 by Bloodbunny
derpa derpa
